start.text: This task will not be a problem for me and I will be honored to do it.
If I say I will be somewhere, then that is where I will be. That's just common courtesy.

retreat.text: I'm not going to point any fingers, but if I was, I would honestly have to say the blame lies primarily with them.
I truly think I cannot be fully blamed for that.

out_of_missiles.text: Next time you are shopping, you should purchase some ammo... and maybe some sugar-coated almonds.
I am out of ammunition! Maybe I should just go hide, yeah?

engaged.text: Please don't shoot me! Please don't shoot me!
I think I can do this.

need_help.text: I feel overwhelmed by the enemy presence around.
True, I am surrounded, but I think it is plain that the fault is almost entirely not my own.
It would be very beneficial for me if someone can help me.
This is not a good place for me to be right now!
The enemy is showing no regard for my safety!

pursuing.text: When is my fifteen minute break?

running.text: I really believe there are far too many opponents for us to reasonably fight.
It is not at all shameful and perhaps even wise if we hide ourselves... or maybe even run away.
I really believe 'every girl for herself' is a sound strategy at this point.

hull_90.text: Someone is out to get me!
That was so uncalled for and not at all fair!

hull_50.text: I knew the cops were out to get me.
I am doing quite a lot of bleeding and would like it to stop now.

hull_30.text: I am not ready to die yet. I still haven't won the approval of my parents.

overload.text: I really feel like this is something that belongs in a flea market and, not to sound too judgemental, but I am allergic to flea markets.

death.text: This is exactly what father said would happen! So... don't tell him... what happened.

victory.text: I truly believe this is why girls make the best soldiers.
I really think I am getting the hang of this!
